message.content:
I need to find the final depreciation item in the cash flow statement based on the transaction data.

To do this, I need to look for entries with the type "Depreciation" in the transaction data.

Looking through the data, I can see a single depreciation entry:

| id | type | date | recorded_date | amount | recorded_amount |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Depreciation20240101001 | Depreciation | 2024-01-01 | 2024-01-01 | 45751.04 | 45751.04 |

This is the only depreciation entry in the data, so the final (and only) depreciation item in the cash flow statement is 45751.04.

```json
{"solution": {'Depreciation': '45751.04'} }
```
